timeline.bodyText:
In issue there is a request  to update message

  
    
      checkstyle/src/main/resources/com/puppycrawl/tools/checkstyle/checks/javadoc/messages.properties
    
    
         Line 9
      in
      1cc84e8
    
    
    
    

        
          
           javadoc.expectedTag=Expected {0} tag for ''{1}''. 
        
    
  


please update it also.
timeline.author: romani
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -21,7 +21,7 @@ javadoc.paragraph.misplaced.tag=

tag should be placed immediately before the javadoc.paragraph.redundant.paragraph=Redundant

tag. javadoc.paragraph.tag.after=Empty line should be followed by

tag on the next line. javadoc.parse.rule.error=Javadoc comment at column {0} has parse error. Details: {1} while parsing {2} -javadoc.return.expected=Expected @return tag. +javadoc.return.expected=Expected @return tag with description.

replies.bodyText: I updated issue description with ltest behavior, Check do not report problems with such message.
replies.author: romani

timeline.bodyText: I updated expected message at issue description, sorry for confusion, please do.
